text: Project X is a 1968 American science fiction movie directed by William Castle and was based on the novels by L. P. Davies. It stars Christopher George, Greta Baldwin, Henry Jones, Harold Gould, Monte Markham, Phillip Pine, Lee Delano and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1968 science fiction movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by William Castle Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in the 22nd century
title: Project X (1968 movie)
